mapper.sql: id, `name`, nonsense_name, extension, storage_type, file_type, content_type, remark, url, `status`, category, create_user_id, modify_user_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM s_file_info
`name` LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND nonsense_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.nonsenseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND extension LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.extension,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND storage_type = #{param2.storageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND file_type = #{param2.fileType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
AND content_type LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.contentType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND remark LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND url LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND `status` = #{param2.status,jdbcType=TINYINT}
AND category LIKE CONCAT('%', #{param2.category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%')
AND fileGroupId = #{param2.fileGroupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
ORDER by id DESC
